title: Full Metal Jayce Using Normal Voice
body: Full Metal Jayce does not have his robotic voice.

replies.body:
Hey xXPh3n0mXx! 

Thanks for reporting this! We're aware of this issue and are hoping to have this resolved next patch. ^-^
thanks for the prompt response katey, happy holidays
I guess he dint followed the rule of equivalent exchange. Or did he? {{champion:126}}
